alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 3:22AM CDT until July 16 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL CHERRY COUNTY... At 321 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Merritt Reservoir to 14 miles southwest of Medicine Lake, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Valentine National Wildlife Refuge, Merritt Reservoir, Highway 61 crossing the Snake River, Steer Creek Campground, Round Lake, Morgan Lake, Indian Hill and Schoolhouse Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 186 and 205. Highway 97 between mile markers 99 and 124. Highway 83 between mile markers 186 and 191. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
